extensionDescription.message: This Add-on shows a notification when have a new question on Support forum.

notify_involved.message: Alert me when there's an update in a question where I've been involved in before

notify_keywords.message: Alert me when a question contains certain keywords

notify_opentab.message: Open alerts in a new tab

watch_en.message: Look out for new questions in English

watch_es.message: Look out for new questions in Espanish

watch_pt.message: Look out for new questions in Brazilian Portuguese

polling.message: Determines how often SUMO will be queried to receive updates
